synopsis.text: Her first life ended in tragedy, but Raeliana McMillan, formerly known as Eunha Park and Rinko Hanasaki, is given a second chance when she awakens in the world of a novel she once read. However, her new life is far from a dream come true. As the eldest daughter of a wealthy baron, Raeliana is destined for an untimely death at the hands of her fianc√©, Lord Francis Brooks. Determined to avoid this fate, Raeliana seeks the protection of Duke Noah Wynknight, the novel's male protagonist, by proposing a fake engagement. Using her knowledge of the novel's plot, Raeliana hopes to outsmart her destiny and rewrite her story. But as she navigates the dangerous world of nobility and deception, Raeliana soon realizes that her new life may be more perilous than she ever imagined. Can she survive long enough to change her fate and find true happiness, or will she fall victim to the same tragic end once again? Only time will tell in this thrilling tale of love, betrayal, and survival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
